column1: text
I can say what I want to
it is just very halting
and I can't find the words all the time
I think it happened at night when I was asleep
it was at breakfast time
and I couldn't say what I wanted to
the words wouldn't come
I  I went to a rehab facility for one week
and there was a speech therapist there
and she did um little kinds of tests
then I came home
and I had a speech therapist for once a week
and she is almost done
and now I am doing Arc Zoom kind of events
and I try to do two or three a week
I don't know how to tell a story
um I  I can't  I don't snory
um I  I don't  can't think of a story
um there was a man
and we play pickleball together
and he died on the court uh two days ago
yes  it was a shock
and I was upset about it
um the boy is kicking a ball
and the ball hits a window and breaks it
and it comes in and surprises the man in the chair
the ball came into the room and knocked over the lamp
and the man stands up from the chair and looks out the window where the ball came from
oh okay
I think that the mother is trying to give the umbrella to the boy
but the boy says no
and he doesn't want the umbrella
and then he goes along
and all_of_a_sudden he gets rained on
and then he goes back
and he is wet
and he tells his mother that he is unhappy and wet
and she gives him the umbrella
and he goes back out
and has the umbrella to protect him from the rain
I think that the man tried to climb up in the tree to get the cat
but the ladder fell down
and he was not able to get down
and the dog is barking
and the firemen are coming to get the man down and to take the kitty out_of the tree
alright
the book begins when the father comes home
and he introduces his daughter to the s new stepmother and the two stepsisters
then it goes on and shows that they do not take very good care of her
the father died
and the stepmother and her daughters were not nice to Cinderella
she had to take care of the horses in the stable and was not being treated very well
then there came uh an announcement that the kingdom was going to have a ball
and that Cinderella wanted to go
and the mice helped her make a pretty dress
but the bad stepsisters tore the dress apart and the necklace that she was going to wear
and they locked her in her room
but the mice came and helped her and get out_of the room
and she had a fairy godmother
and the fairy godmother made a beautiful white dress and a pumpkin and turned into a beautiful coach
and the mice were beautiful horses
and the carriage took her to the ball
and she had a dance with the prince
and they were very happy
she was very worried about the time
and the clock ruck
and she had to hurry away down the stairs
and in the process she lost one of her glass slippers
and the pumpkin no  carriage turned back into a pumpkin and the mice back  the horses back into mice
and then they made an announcement in the kingdom that they were going to look for the lady who had the foot that would fit in it
and then the stepmother and the stepdaughters tried
and Cinderella came out
and the glass slipper fit her foot perfectly
and then she married the prince
and they lived happily ever after
I would have two pieces of bread
and on one I would spread the jam
and on the other I would spread the peanut butter
then I would put them together into a sandwich
